targets.query:
from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start:-1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "apcupsd")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_charge_percent")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start:-1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ${UpsPower} * r._value * 0.01}))
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ${UpsPower} * r._value * 0.01}))
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "time_left_ns")
  |> last()

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: ${TimeZone})

data = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

cols = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]

final = data
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Day"}))
  |> keep(columns:cols)

out = final
  |> window(every: 1h)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: 24h)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ${UpsPower} * r._value * 0.01 * ${AvgKWprice} * 0.001}))
  |> group()
  |> yield()

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: ${TimeZone})

bucket1 = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: -${Downsample_len}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

data = bucket1

cols = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]

final = data
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Day"}))
    |> keep(columns:cols)

final
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: 1mo)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: 670.0 * r._value * 0.01 * 24.0}))
  |> yield()

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: ${TimeZone})

data = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._time >= date.sub(from: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStop, unit: 1d), d: 6d))

cols = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]

final = data
     |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Day"}))
     |> keep(columns:cols)

final
  //|> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> window(every: 10m)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 6.0}))
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_start", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ${UpsPower} * r._value * 0.01}))

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: ${TimeZone})

data = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

cols = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]

final = data
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Day"}))
  |> keep(columns:cols)

out = final
  |> window(every: 1h)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: 24h)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ${UpsPower} * r._value * 0.01 * ${AvgKWprice} * 0.001}))
  |> group()
  |> yield()

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: ${TimeZone})

bucket1 = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: -${Downsample_len}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

data = bucket1

cols = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]

out = data
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Day"}))
    |> keep(columns:cols)

out
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: 1mo)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ${UpsPower} * r._value * 0.01 * 24.0 * ${AvgKWprice} * 0.001}))
  |> group()
  |> yield()

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: ${TimeZone})

bucket1 = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

data = bucket1

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: ${TimeZone})

data = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

cols = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]

out = data
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Day"}))
    |> keep(columns:cols)

out
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ${UpsPower} * r._value * 0.01 * 24.0 * 30.0}))

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: ${TimeZone})

data = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

cols = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]

out = data
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Day"}))
    |> keep(columns:cols)

out
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ${UpsPower} * r._value * 0.01 * 24.0}))

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: 2h)

bucket1 = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "input_voltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
  
data = bucket1

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: ${TimeZone})

bucket1 = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: -${Downsample_len}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

data = bucket1

cols = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]

out = data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => 
        r._time <= date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStop, unit: 1mo) and
        r._time >= date.truncate(t: date.sub(from: v.timeRangeStop, d: 1mo), unit: 1mo))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Day"}))
    |> keep(columns:cols)

out
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: 1mo)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ${UpsPower} * r._value * 0.01 * 24.0 * ${AvgKWprice} * 0.001}))
  |> group()
  |> yield()

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: ${TimeZone})

bucket1 = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: -${Downsample_len}, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ups_name == "${UpsName}" and r._field == "load_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

data = bucket1

cols = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]

out = data
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Day"}))
    |> keep(columns:cols)

out
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: 1mo)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ${UpsPower} * r._value * 0.01 * 24.0 * ${AvgKWprice} * 0.001}))
  |> group()
  |> yield()

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.fixed(offset: 2h)

bucket1 = from(bucket: "${InfluxBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "apcupsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "output_voltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
  
data = bucket1

list.description: Make sure to use float value
list.label: Average KW/h price
list.name: AvgKWprice

list.description: Make sure you have foat value
list.label: Power rating
list.name: UpsPower
